session_info.name: TUOXA - Ion Sources, Traps and Charge Breeding

papers.title: All-permanent Magnet ECR Ion Source DECRIS-PM
authors: Super-heavy-element factory is under construction at the Flerov Laboratory for Nuclear Reactions
Dubna. The factory will include DC-280 cyclotron

which will be equipped with two 100 kV high voltage platforms. A high charge state all-permanent magnet 14 GHz ECRIS ’ DECRIS-PM has been designed and fabricated to provide intense multiple charge state ion beams. The request for the source is a production of medium mass ions with A/q=4/7.5 such as 48Ca8+. The conceptual design of DECRIS-PM is presented. During the first tests at the ECR test bench
